subject: Pro Plus Pedals not recognised
description_text:
Hi,

I have a set of Pro Plus pedals.

For some reason the pedals are not recognised in freejoy or simsonn
manager, only in the simpedals config v4. I looked at resetting the
firmware or downloading the drivers but the links from the product pages on
your website that go to download.simsonn.com seem to be broken.

Any help would be appreciated.

Many thanks,
Rees

conversations.body_text: Hi，Rees Varney，  Please download the latest calibration software, SIMSONN Manager version 2.0.8. For the Pro Plus, go to the update interface and select “Manual Firmware Update,” then navigate to the pedals-firmware folder → pedals folder, and select the plus.sfu file to proceed with the update.    https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download

Hi,

I tried the mentioned manager but it doesn't detect my pedals, and provides
no manual firmware update option (I have tried clicking the manual update
link inside the settings -> update section but it does not do/ open
anything).

Is the pedals firmware downloaded with the manager, and if so where is that
folder on my PC? I am wondering if maybe I can use the flasher tool from
the simpedals config v4 to update the firmware in case it is too old to be
detected by the simsonn manager.

Many thanks,
Rees

On Sat, Jul 12, 2025 at 7:46 AM service @simsonn.com

Nevermind, I reopened the app after leaving it in the background for 30
minutes and suddenly they were there?

I guess this is maybe linked to why the sim pedals config takes a long time
to open if it can't detect the pedals for a while.
Hi Rees Varney,     Has the upgrade been successfully completed now?

Yes thanks!

On Sat, 12 Jul 2025 at 11:33, service @simsonn.com
